events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for the Software Engineer role.
A recruiter has been assigned to your candidate profile to assist you through the hiring process and answer any questions.
We completed your initial screening interview where we discussed your background, experience, and motivation for the software developer role.
Thank you for promptly providing detailed answers regarding your technical skills and previous project experience during the screening.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 14:00 UTC with our senior developer panel.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving abilities and coding proficiency.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 18th at 11:00 UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career aspirations.
The HR interview has been successfully completed, and we found your expectations and values align well with our company.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position including competitive salary and benefits package.
We received your positive feedback on the offer and your enthusiasm about the potential to contribute to our engineering team.
You officially accepted the job offer, and we are thrilled to welcome you aboard as a new software engineer.
Your onboarding process has started, including access setup, orientation sessions, and team introductions to help you get settled.
The hiring process has been successfully closed with you joining the Engineering team as a valued Software Engineer.
